lead_paragraph: Shawn Green busted out of his slump with a huge day at the plate and Oliver Perez pitched his second career shutout for his first win since May as the Mets completed a doubleheader sweep of the Braves.
snippet: Shawn Green busted out of his slump with a huge day at the plate and Oliver Perez pitched his second career shutout for his first win since May as the Mets completed a doubleheader sweep of the Braves.
